text: Manasseh Damukana Sogavare (born 17 January 1955) was the sixth Prime Minister of Solomon Islands from 24 April 2019 until 2 May 2024. He was the prime minister between 2000–2001, 2006—2007 and 2014–2017. Sogavare has been in the National Parliament since 1997.Page on Sogavare at Solomon Islands Parliament website . ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of the Solomon Islands Category:Current national leaders
title: Manasseh Sogavare
